encyclopedia.content: 英语 在英语中，ing是动词的一种后缀（即在动词后加上该后缀），是进行时态（be+doing）的动词一种分词形式，如： He is doing his homework.（他正在写他的作业） 同时，某些动词之后加上该后缀可以变为其名词形式，如： swim→swimming 动词变为进行时的规则： 动词以一个不发音的e 结尾，去掉e,加 ing;动词以ee结尾，直接加ing,如：agree→agreeing;see →seeing 以一个辅音字母+一个元音字母 + 一个辅音字母结尾，且元音不读

entry.tran: (加在动词后构成现在分词;现在分词可与助动词一起构成进行时态或像形容词一样使用)
entry.def: -ing is added to verbs to form present participles. Present participles are used with auxiliary verbs to make continuous tenses. They are also used like adjectives, describing a person or thing as doing something.

example.ex: He was walking along the street...
Children sit round small tables, talking to each other...
example.tran: 孩子们围坐在小桌子旁,相互说着话。

entry.tran: (用于动词后构成表示活动的不可数名词)
entry.def: -ing is added to verbs to form uncount nouns referring to activities.

example.ex: Gardening is very popular in Britain...
example.tran: 园艺在英国非常受欢迎。

example.ex: This campaign is one of the most successful in the history of advertising.
example.tran: 这一宣传推广是广告史上最为成功的活动之一。
